page.title: 20Events
page.content: Plans by IW Motor Cycle Club to use land at Windmill Copse,Chale,for trials riding have been turned down by South Wight Borough Council's Planning Committe.In considering the application members were told that 70 letters of objection had been received from individuals and a further 7 letters of protest from amenity societies. {Atherfield Farm,Chale,Ventnor,IW. {Wed.15th May 1985,Auction Sale. {98 Hereford Cattle,Extensive range of {Potato & Arable Equipment,Haymaking & {General Tackle,14 Tractors,Land-Rover, {3 Vans.} Open Shore Angling,July 20-21st 7pm-5am.Â£800 worth of prizes. Heaviest bag. {Domesday Survey,Atherfield Area IW {carried out by the Junior class at {Chale C.E.Primary School,Chale,IW.
